LanguageData.ARA_Neurotyrant_Harvest.label: Evolution point harvest
LanguageData.ARA_Neurotyrant_Harvest.description: The spirit absorber drains the target's intelligence and converts it into evolution points. Absorption takes a short amount of time, but the target dies instantly.
LanguageData.ARA_Neurotyrant_PsychicLoadDump.label: load recoil
LanguageData.ARA_Neurotyrant_PsychicLoadDump.descript: It forces the enormous load that the spirit absorbing species is subjected to onto the target. If the target does not have psychic abilities, this recoil will cause instant death. Individuals with psychic abilities will be able to avoid the fatal impact, but will accumulate a large amount of psychic entropy.
